pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Types for FGO Game Data APIThis is a package containing the Pydantic definitions of the objects returned by https://api.atlasacademy.io/rapidoc.Example usage:```from fgo_api_types.enums import Traitfrom fgo_api_types.gameenums import SvtTypefrom fgo_api_types.nice import NiceServantr = httpx.get("https://api.atlasacademy.io/nice/NA/servant/200")fujino = NiceServant.parse_raw(r.content)assert Trait.genderFemale in fujino.traits```
